title: Akha (1991) Genesis Portion
title_vernacular: Akha (1991) ສ່ວນຂອງປື້ມປະຖົມມະການ
description: This fragment of the book of Genesis, chapters 1 through 4, was translated from the Hebrew into Akha by the Thailand Bible Society in 1991 who also has a complete Bible with both the Old and New Testaments. The Akha language is spoken in Southern China.

language.name: Akha
language.area: Shan state, east Kengtung District. Also in China, Laos, Thailand, Viet Nam.
